TopicTitle: Arrr! Shiver me timbers, it be the 19th of Septembaaaaaarrrrrr!

Articles.Content:
. . . And that be talk like a pirate day! So arr to all ye shipmates aboard the Good Ship Kerbal!

Aaaaaaaarrrrrrrrrrr!

Arr, she still be the 18th here Mr Future Pirate.

I be turnin' all the scurvy dogs into pirates around here and you can to.

To make anyone a pirate, just ask them what be the letter after Q in the alphabet. ARRR! They be a pirate!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Arr, she still be the 18th here Mr Future Pirate.

Arr, that be nowt but your opinion!

Graarrr!

I was a-been postin' this 'ere thread, but ye beat me to it!

Damn these new-fashioned magic parrots!

Arrrr!
